reviews.review: This game is heaps of fun, it will make your heart pound and sweat heaps. That is for the first five hours and then it is the same thing over and over again with no difference other than the Killer and maps. This game never seems different and after a while gets boring. That is why I have such a low play time in this game. It is fun and I'm sure wayy better with friends then solo.

honestly...this game has gone down a lot from when i first played it....i think that the game devs should focus on working on the games bugs..balance...rank system...do somthing rather then pumping out characters so for the time being im giving it a no unless you dont care about some flaws and toxic people

juego pa gente gei, jsut like me

11/4

Wo f√§ngt man bei Dead by Daylight am besten an?
Ich habe mich daf√ºr entschieden mit den negativen Seiten des Spiels zu beginnen.

Negativ:
- F√ºr Anf√§nger bleibt der Spielspa√ü wohl erst einmal aus, bis sie etwas erfahrener werden. 
Grund daf√ºr:
- Campende und sluggenden Killer
- Antimates, die nur an sich denken (dich vom Haken abfarmen -am besten gleich 2x hintereinander-, mit dem Killer hinter dir herrennen, deine Fluchtm√∂glichkeiten blockieren oder absichtlich die Aufmerksamkeit des Killers auf sich ziehen)
- Spieler die am Anfang der Spielrunde disconnecten und somit den Spielverlauf beeintr√§chtigen
- Zu lange Lobbywartezeiten f√ºr Killer auf hohem Rang (sprich 18+)
- Nervige Survivor die nichts besseres zutun haben als dir bei jeder Gelegenheit die Taschenlampe ins Gesicht zu halten oder dich st√§ndig zu teabaggen
- Immer wiederkehrende bugs nach patches

Wenn dich all das nicht juckt, dann hier die positven Seiten von Dead by Daylight.

Positiv:
- Schnelle, teils gut erkl√§rte Tutorials f√ºr Survivor und Killer (nach Abschluss beider Tutorials erhaltet ihr 50k Blutpunkte als Startkapital)
- Verschiedene Maps
- Verschiedene Killer & Survivor die dir auch kostenlos zur Verf√ºgung stehen oder durch erspielbare, schillernde Scherben freigeschaltet werden k√∂nnen
- Viele verschiedene Perks die unterschiedlichste Spieltechniken zulassen
- T√§gliche Rituale durch die du dir extra Blutpunkte verdienen kannst
- Unterschiedlichste F√§higkeiten der Killer f√ºr vielseitiges Gameplay
- √úbersichtliches Layout
- Schneller Lobbybeitritt f√ºr Survivor
- Spa√ü mit Freunden durch "Survive with friends" oder "Kill your friends"
- Immer wiederkehrende Bloodpoint-Events die das leveln eurer Charatere erleichtern 
- Verschiedene Kleidungen f√ºr deine Charaktere (auch ohne Geld auszugeben)
- Jahreszeiten-Events wie: Winter-Events & Halloween-Events

Wenn man die Spielweise der Antimates und "unfairen" Killer also mal au√üer Acht l√§sst, (f√ºr die, die Entwickler nun mal nichts k√∂nnen) ein gelungenes, wenn auch nicht ganz bugfreies Spiel, dass viel Spa√ü bringen kann.
Dead by daylight. A game where people don't die and time doesn't pass.

Legit just don't buy this game, please.

Playing killer is one of the worst experiences I can think of. Even if you play perfectly on any killer except Nurse (I'll get to her in a second.), gens are done too fast to the point it doesn't matter. Hillbilly is the only one that can maybe do it, but that depends on the map. You'll even get just 45 second chases, not long at all, and 3 gens can pop after that because it took you a minute to find the first survivor. One goes for the save, one's on the hook, one's being chased. Seems like a great situation right? Didn't think that only 2 gens are left and 3 are back on the gens because the next person you're chasing is doing another just 45 second chase, and then, just when you're about to hit them, last gen pops and everyone has Adrenaline. Congratulations, you just played nigh perfectly and there was nothing you could do about gens going that fast. 

Onto Nurse. Nurse is the only killer actually able to get some kills in the time it takes to do the generators. You have to be good at her in order to do that though. And even when you are good, you have to hope the game isn't buggy this patch, because sometimes, you can get pushed to the side in the middle of a blink, blink somewhere you shouldn't have even gone, and sometimes, you'll get a pretend gen pull but it's really just a wipe then fatigue.

Playing survivor is the only fun thing to do, but when you're not in a chase you're holding M1 and pushing space occasionally, so then it evens out to not being very fun.

I can only say get this game if you plan on playing survivor, because killer is just so bad and annoying to play.

Probably of the best game ive ever played... my girlfriend tried for about a year to get me into this game, ive seen gameplay of it and it never really interested me.. finally, the game went on sale to like 80 percent so i just said the heck with it and bought it... I wasnt expecting a good experience because of the gameplay i saw of it... but... to my surprise, it was a way differnt experience playing the game then watching it be played. I love this game hands down. Wish I woulda listened to my girlfriend earlier on and started playing a long time ago! 5 Star rating from me!

Pros + 

+ Looks decent. 
+ Sound is great.
+ Character progression. 
+ Cosmetics.
+ Constantly adding new killers and content. 
 
Cons -

- The tutorial system is far to basic. 
- Matchmaking taking 20 minutes to match up is annoying. 

Overall: This is an interesting game that really has slipped under my radar until recently, it does hide and seek really well and reminded me of those epic games of HnS I use to play as a child. The audio ques are pretty legit and the overall atmosphere of the game paints a real sense of danger and urgency to escape from. 

Well done .

Great game with unique gameplay. One killer vs. four survivors working together to open the exit before the killer executes them all. For achievement hunters, it seems like a great game. Probably 200+ hours needed to 100% though, but everything seems balanced.
